Fitzgerald (Ryan Gosling), a disaffected teenager who has apparently murdered a severely retarded peer, the brother of popular high school student Allison Hargrove (Jena Malone). Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, this film depicts his adolescence in the country, the ideals he pursued and the books, paintings and cities that had made an impression on him.
The silent black-and-white world of discord juxtaposes against the world of Miyazawa that has never been shown in a comedy.
